content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment, Ryanah. I understand that you're interested in renting it for a period of time. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is the rental price you're thinking of offering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. While I appreciate the price you're proposing, I'm afraid it's not quite what I was looking for. I would like to see if we can come to a more mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask, what is your budget for renting an apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euros per month. I can pay 1000 Euros per month.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.

Please TERMINATE this negotiation.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for informing me of your budget and willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month. I appreciate your understanding and willingness to be on good terms with me as your landlord. However, after considering my needs and goals, I'm afraid I must decline your offer. I want to ensure that I'm getting the highest possible rental price for my apartment, and I believe that the 1000 Euros per month you're proposing is not quite what I'm looking for. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and hope you can understand my position.

TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
